title: England win toss and bowl in Perth
content:
Ben Stokes has won the toss and decided to bowl in the first Ashes test match in Perth.

England have stuck with Shoaib Bashir as their specialist spinner while Mark Wood makes his return, playing his first test this year.

Australia meanwhile have gone back to Marnus Labuschagne who will bat three and have chosen Jake Weatherald to partner Usman Khawaja at the top of the order.

title: Mark Wood to miss 5th test
content:
Mark Wood is set to miss the 5th Ashes Test in Sydney due to a side strain picked up in the Boxing Day test.

Brydon Carse is the most likely replacement for the England quick. England are expected to remain unchanged otherwise as they look to secure their first away Ashes series for 15 years.
